examples.korean: communities bound together by customs and traditions 발음듣기 관습과 전통들로 긴밀하게 묶여 있는 공동체들 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: communities bound together by customs and traditions 발음

examples.korean: Community leaders have renewed calls for a peaceful settlement. 발음듣기 공동체 지도자들이 평화로운 해결을 거듭 강조해 왔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Community leaders have renewed calls for a peaceful settlement. 발음

examples.korean: Immigrants have been successfully assimilated into the community. 발음듣기 이민자들이 공동체 내에 성공적으로 동화되어 왔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Immigrants have been successfully assimilated into the community. 발음

examples.korean: a community that lives by fishing 발음듣기 어업으로 먹고 사는 공동체 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a community that lives by fishing 발음

examples.korean: a global economic monoculture 발음듣기 전 세계적 단일 경제 공동체 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
